name: Genius 3: Into the Toy Planets
overview: Daniele Liverani has announced the immediate availability of his latest version of the Genius Series arcade games for the Apple II . Genius 3 – Into The Toy Planets is a major continuation of the theme Daniele began more than 5 years ago. Each game that Daniele produces comes with not only the Game Disk in Apple II emulator ready format .DSK, but also a PDF instruction manual, a 5.25 inch floppy disk label PDF as well as a tip document entitled Secrets for the users who get stuck in the game.
